caption: Several mechanics are seen working on machinery, conducting repairs. The scene transitions to a view of the Milky Way. An elderly person is seen in front of a chalkboard, explaining something to others. The elder moves to a computer and begins working, placing some files into a suitcase. Something resembling a black hole traverses through space, and the video intermittently cuts to people engaged in discussions. Next, a massive hole with rushing water becomes visible, leading into the abyss. An accountant and a rower are pulled into it. Many new cities emerge. A star is split open. In a city, an elderly man drives a car, and shortly after, he enters a highway. A woman is also driving. On top of a mountain, two spherical structures are present. A man and a woman are seen working on computers. The video continues to switch between different conversational scenes.
